channel.title: Possessor jump vs psychic
channel.description: If possessor jumps, the one who got jumped can easily tell psychic, and psychic can use day ability and get him killed literally the very next day. Seems a little unbalanced for an ability thats supposed to make possessor less suspicious actually get him killed in one day. If a psychic is known to exist, possessor would only be able to jump to the psychic, and even then that would be a terrible move since he cant prove with night or day abilities. Better than a guaranteed death a day letter I guess, should he jump to anyone else. Perhaps make the one who got jumped unable to talk? What do you guys think?

item.title: Possessor jump vs psychic
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Why would a sheriff know you are the Reaper?

Read full topic

item.title: Possessor jump vs psychic
item.dc:creator: livejamie
item.description:
I agree.

Your logic applies to other neutral killers as well: the mechanic of talking to the dead is problematic and punishes good plays.

If I chill the Sheriff because I don’t want him to out me as Reaper, they kill him and I should be fine. But if there’s a Psychic (and in a lot of games there are two) then I’m fucked regardless because he’ll just talk to them and tell them everything. I would have wasted my abilities and efforts trying to make a good play when I’m already playing the hardest role in the game as a neutral killer.

Read full topic

I agree with possessor jump victim being unable to talk to psychic

item.description:
If possessor jumps, the one who got jumped can easily tell psychic, and psychic can use day ability and get him killed literally the very next day. Seems a little unbalanced for an ability thats supposed to make possessor less suspicious actually get him killed in one day. If a psychic is known to exist, possessor would only be able to jump to the psychic, and even then that would be a terrible move since he cant prove with night or day abilities. Better than a guaranteed death a day letter I guess, should he jump to anyone else.
